channel.title: Varrock
channel.description:
Well I Downloaded Total War Scape Source Couple Days Ago And Now I wana make Varrock pk Zone again Any1 Knows the Coords? on ( Total War Scape? )
TY in advanced[br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2007, 07:20:06 PM[/size][hr]little help plz?

item.title: Varrock
item.dc:creator: @pmgz pmgz
item.description:
@pmgz wrote:

Ok look up this nonwild
replace that whole boolean with this public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Varrock
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

So, you want to make varrock a pk zone?

If this isn’t what you’re looking for tell me.
Go to client.java and search for:

public boolean nonWild() {

Go to varrock and find the South-eastern most corner of the area you want to pk in.
Find the most North-western corner of the area you want to pk in.

Remember/write down these coords.
Look in the boolean and make sure that none of the coords in the square you picked show up. Delete them if you find them. I’d do it for you, but you’d never learn that way.

Read full topic
